page.title: 09Recreation
page.content: A survey of recreational activities of children in our area showed that outdoor activities such as{football, {rounders,fishing,cycling,swimming} and rollerskating are the most popular.Suprisingly only 10% of the children surveyed said that watching{ {television}was their most popular spare time activity.{Reading}is a favourite pastime for many children of this age.Several children enjoy playing a{musical instrument.}A lot of children now use computers at home. The most popular recreational activities for the family as a whole include{trips}out eg.to Blackpool and the Lake District.The children's parents tend to go for sports such as {badminton,golf,snooker and darts. Other popular activities include bowls,fishing,keep fit,gardening, watching television and videos.
